title: I will never get over the semi-final loss to France in 2011 - that's why I'm so desperate for Wales to reach the final this time
text:
I remember exactly where I was on the field eight years ago against France when Sam Warburton’s infamous tip tackle on Vincent Clerc happened. I was stood waiting in the backline, 10 minutes into the Rugby World Cup semi-final, as France took an attacking lineout.

The ball came off the top, Clerc was running off the hip of the scrum-half. In a flash, Sam had dropped him on his head. I looked at Fox - Jonathan Davies - my centre partner next door to me, and we both grimaced. We knew it was red.

At half-time, Sam was just quiet. It was one of those half-time chats where you look around the changing room and recognise that everyone is going to empty the tank and give it everything to stay in the...
description: I remember exactly where I was on the field eight years ago against France when Sam Warburton’s infamous tip tackle on Vincent Clerc happened.
